website_summaries.verdict: A good book for practicing the most common or difficult words featured on typical TOEFL tests.
pros: The book presents a number of key and common words along with the definition and context
Example phrases are offered to help put the word in the correct usage and context
cons: The lack of practice-specific content makes it difficult to use this book alone to study and prepare

customer_reviews.title: Not very good if you already have a good English level
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book because my TOEFL course required it for the class. I must say I never used it inside or outside the class. I feel this book shows you good vocabulary in different contexts to analyze the correct meaning, it has new vocabulary for preparing a good writing text, I wouldn’t say this works as a training for reading, because the examples are not according with the complexity of TOEFL. I feel TOEFL reading has an academic vocabulary which I can’t find completely in this book.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Daniela Rodriguez Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: Best Vocabulary List
customer_reviews.text: I wrote the TOEFL test and recognized many of the words listed in this book. I can only recommend it for everybody willing to expand their vocabulary
customer_reviews.author: Natascha hey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too much for the examn
customer_reviews.text: This is great to improve your vocabulary, but it’s a way too much for the exam. It’s a great companion but don’t be overwhelmed.Use it as guide , don’t try to memorize everything !
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Extensive study guide brings results
customer_reviews.text: This book undoubtedly helped me with the dreaded TOEFL exam. Its up-to-date exercises, model essays, and in-depth vocabulary review gave me the knowledge and confidence necessary to pass my test. Beyond that, it remains a helpful guide to retain those essential words necessary to master fluent language. It'll always have a place on my bookshelf, and I couldn't be happier with this pick, among the several manuals out there.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Nightshade

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this book before toefl exam and it includes useful reading passages and some exercises but in my toefl ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book before toefl exam and it includes useful reading passages and some exercises but in my toefl exam I couldn't find any words which I studied from this book. I don't know maybe a it was just a bad luck but at least I should find something from this book in exam.
customer_reviews.author: kamuran

customer_reviews.title: Best vocabulary book for TOEFL
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this book to all my TOEFL students. This summary perfectly reflects the sophisticated low-frequency vocabulary needed for the TOEFL and it's mixed with high-frequency words to create a rounded set of vocabulary. However, as a student, don't expect to read this book in a week or two and have memorized all words. It takes a lot of practice and repetition to remember and use these words naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Urban

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good collection of vocabulary useful for TOEFL test as well as everyday life
customer_reviews.author: SorPar
